channel.title: A small problemo
channel.description: When an admin and an owner die, they lose their stuff... how can I fix that...

item.title: A small problemo
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

[quote=“Saphire`, post:11, topic:392786”]I don’t use Delta, I quickly downloaded the original source to find out this problem.

Hyperion ftw.[/quote]
hardly anyone uses delta anymore… but still if you bothered to read the code he posted you would see that all the death actions other than the item dropping are there.

EDIT: I dont appreciate whoever deleted my posts, and whoever did should probably delete everything saphire has posted in this topic, me calling him out was of more use than everything he’s posted.

Read full topic

item.title: A small problemo
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

[quote=“Saphire`, post:9, topic:392786”]if (playerRights >= 2) { ProtItem = true; youdied(); }[/quote]
no… the youdied method only contains the item dropping, there is no need for protItem or any of that code you posted… all the death spawns/emotes/timers are done outside of the youdied method, so bypassing the method is what you do. If he adds what you just posted only admins and owners will lose items when they die

Read full topic

item.title: A small problemo
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

[quote=“usama299, post:7, topic:392786”]Saphire, I already hae them… but isn’t there something like

if playerRights > 1 { KeepItemHandle(); {

Or something like that… but the method “KeepItemHandle” doesnt work

the death item removal for delta is youdied();, which is within the code you posted, just put

if (playerRights < 2) {
youdied();
}

Do I put that anywhere? likr anywhere between the death methods?[/quote]
the code he posted has nothing to do with what you are asking… all it does is control the items kept on death. Just do what i posted and you are golden

@usama

find where it says youdied(); in the code you posted. Before it add

if (playerRights < 2) {

and then after youdied(); add

}

Read full topic

item.title: A small problemo
item.dc:creator: @usama299 usama299
item.description:
@usama299 wrote:

Its Delta…

I have many death methods

[code] // If killed apply dead
if (deathStage == 1 ) {
if (attacknpc > 0) {
server.npcHandler.ResetAttackPlayer(attacknpc);
}
ResetAttack();
ResetAttackNPC();

		deathStage = 2;
		poisoned = false;
		poisonDmg = false;
		fighting = false;
		hits = 0;
		startAnimation(532);
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		deathTimer = System.currentTimeMillis();
		currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
		playerLevel[0] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]);
		playerLevel[1] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]);
		playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]);
		playerLevel[4] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]);
		playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]);
		playerLevel[6] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]);
		sendFrame126("Prayer: "+playerLevel[5]+"/"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])+"", 687);
		resetfollowers();
		refreshSkills();
		killMyNPCs();
		resetKnight();
		skulledBy = "";
	}
	if (!IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 &&  System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) {
	client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];
	youdied();
	killerz.sM("You have defeated "+playerName+".");
	killerz.pkPoints += 20;
		updateRequired = true;
		following = false;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			}
	if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave()) {
		toX = 3086;
		toY = 3494;
		inPitsGame = false;
		PlayerHandler.playersInPit -= 1;
		AtkPray = 0;
		StrPrayer = 0;
		DefPray = 0;
		RangePray = 0;
		MagePray = 0;
		PrayHeal = false;
		ProtItem = false;
		ProtMage = false;
		ProtRange = false;
		ProtMelee = false;
		Redemption = false;
		Retribution = false;
		Smite = false;
		Chivalry = false;
		Piety = false;
		isSkulled = false;
		lastSkull = 0;
		headIcon = 0;
		turnpray();
		heightLevel = 0;
		currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
		deathStage = 0;
		resetAnimation();
		frame1();
		prayOn = false;
		AntiTeleDelay = 0;
		EntangleDelay = 0;
		RfdWave = 0;
		sM("Oh dear you have died!");
		pkPoints -= 20;
        		resetOtherAtk();
		followID = 0;
		followID2 = 0;
	}
	if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && !isInPitGame() && IsInFightCave()) {
	toX = 3088;
	toY = 3501;
		AtkPray = 0;
		StrPrayer = 0;
		DefPray = 0;
		RangePray = 0;
		MagePray = 0;
		PrayHeal = false;
		ProtItem = false;
		ProtMage = false;
		ProtRange = false;
		ProtMelee = false;
		Redemption = false;
		Retribution = false;
		Smite = false;
		Chivalry = false;
		Piety = false;
		isSkulled = false;
		lastSkull = 0;
		headIcon = 0;
		turnpray();
		heightLevel = 0;
		currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
		deathStage = 0;
		resetAnimation();
		frame1();
		prayOn = false;
		RfdWave = 0;
		sM("Oh dear you have died!");
        		resetOtherAtk();
	}
	if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && !isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave()) {

youdied();

		toX = 3086;
		toY = 3494;
		AtkPray = 0;
		StrPrayer = 0;
		DefPray = 0;
		RangePray = 0;
		MagePray = 0;
		PrayHeal = false;
		ProtItem = false;
		ProtMage = false;
		ProtRange = false;
		ProtMelee = false;
		Redemption = false;
		Retribution = false;
		Smite = false;
		Chivalry = false;
		Piety = false;
		isSkulled = false;
		lastSkull = 0;
		headIcon = 0;
		turnpray();
		heightLevel = 0;
		currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
		deathStage = 0;
		resetAnimation();
		frame1();
		prayOn = false;
		RfdWave = 0;
		sM("Oh dear you have died!");
        		resetOtherAtk();
		if (destruct)
		{
				absX = 3087;
				absY = 3486;
		}
		savegame(false);
	}[/code]

Can you edit them for me and tell me how?

Read full topic

item.title: A small problemo
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

public void applyProtectItemProt() { if(!isSkulled) keepItem4(); if (itemKept4 > 0) { if (itemSlot4) deleteItem(itemKept4, itemKept4Slot, 1); else if (!itemSlot4) deleteequiment(itemKept4, itemKept4Slot); } if(isSkulled) keepItem1(); if (itemKept1 > 0) { if (itemSlot1) deleteItem(itemKept1, itemKept1Slot, 1); else if (!itemSlot1) deleteequiment(itemKept1, itemKept1Slot); } }

public void keepItem4() { int highest = 0; for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) { if (itemKept1Slot != i && itemKept2Slot != i && itemKept3Slot != i) { int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemValue(playerItems[i]-1)); if(value > highest && playerItems[i]-1 != -1) { highest = value; itemKept4 = playerItems[i]-1; itemKept4Slot = i; itemSlot4 = true; } } } for (int i = 0; i < playerEquipment.length; i++) { if (itemKept1Slot != i && itemKept2Slot != i && itemKept3Slot != i) { int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemValue(playerEquipment[i])); if(value > highest && playerEquipment[i] != -1) { highest = value; itemKept4 = playerEquipment[i]; itemKept4Slot = i; itemSlot4 = false; } } } }

Read full topic

item.title: A small problemo
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

You dont need to know any more… its basic.

In most servers admins are playerRights 2, either use that or create a boolean for being an admin.

Find your death method, and where it removes items, just add an if statement excluding admins. If you cant figure out how to add it from here, you shouldnt have a server in the first place.

Some methods for dying I have seen is youDied(), removeItems(), death()

Read full topic
